subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Knees
Surgery and Surgeons
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Ivica Kostelic won a World Cup slalom five weeks after knee surgery, following in the path of his sister, Janica, a four-time Olympic gold medalist in Alpine skiing.
snippet: Ivica Kostelic won a World Cup slalom five weeks after knee surgery, following in the path of his sister, Janica, a four-time Olympic gold medalist in Alpine skiing.
